metadata.name: Screen Capture Activity Via Psr.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects execution of Windows Problem Steps Recorder (psr.exe), a utility used to record the user screen and clicks.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\psr.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/start')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-start'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of Windows Problem Steps Recorder (psr.exe), a utility used to record the user screen and clicks.
